novel extension of the graph convolution.from sentence: In this work , we propose a novel extension of the graph convolutional network ) that is tailored for relation extraction .

dependency structure.from sentence: Our model encodes the dependency structure over the input sentence with efficient graph convolution operations , then extracts entity - centric representations to make robust relation predictions .

apply.from sentence: We also apply a novel path - centric pruning technique to remove irrelevant information from the tree while maximally keeping relevant content , which further improves the performance of several dependencybased models including ours .
